text: Another Round (, "binge drinking") is a 2020 Danish Dutch Swedish comedy-drama movie directed by Thomas Vinterberg and starring Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang, Lars Ranthe, Susse Wold, Maria Bonnevie. It was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 2021. It is set to be remade into an American version with Leonardo DiCaprio starring and Jim Jarmusch directing. ==Other websites== * Category:2020 comedy movies Category:2020 drama movies Category:2020s comedy-drama movies Category:Danish comedy movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Dutch comedy movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Thomas Vinterberg Category:Movies about educators
title: Another Round (movie)
